Title: 897: How to Enable Enterprise AI Transformation, with Strategy Consultant Diane Hare
Description:
Diane Hare talks to Jon Krohn about the power of storytelling for corporate buy-in of AI initiatives, how to actively implement AI to transform organizations, and how emerging professionals can upskill themselves. Hear how she discovered her background in storytelling at Ernst & Young and her work with Simon Sinek, which she finds to be integral to her process. Inspired by Sinek’s aphorism “start with why”, Diane notes that many companies neglect this crucial part of their mission because they never take the time to work on it.



Additional materials: ⁠⁠⁠www.superdatascience.com/897⁠⁠
